meanings.definition: To betray or desert an allegiance or cause.
meanings.sent1: He renegaded on his promise to help his friend.
meanings.sent2: She renegaded on her commitment to attend the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat renegaded on its duty to catch mice and instead napped all day.
meanings.sent4: The student renegaded on studying for the test and ended up failing.
meanings.sent5: The soldier renegaded on his country by joining the enemy forces.

meanings.definition: A person who deserts a party or cause for another.
meanings.sent1: The renegaded was once a loyal member of the team.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled a renegaded after switching political parties.
meanings.sent3: The renegaded surprised everyone by joining the opposing side.
meanings.sent4: The renegaded's actions caused a stir within the group.
meanings.sent5: Being a renegaded can lead to mistrust and isolation from others.
